body_html:
No, adding c:/ does not. Still the same failure.
I even copied all these three files to the same folder where I am starting the script and I called the script like this:

C:\Users\bbb738\tensorflow>python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/label_wav.py --graph=my_frozen_graph.pb --labels=conv_labels.txt --wav=a5d485dc_nohash_0.wav

I still see the same failure:

CRITICAL:tensorflow:Audio file does not exist
CRITICAL:tensorflow:Labels file does not exist
CRITICAL:tensorflow:Graph file does not exist_

body:
No, adding c:/   does not.  Still the same  failure.
I even copied all these three files to the same folder where I am starting the script and I called the script like this:

_C:\Users\bbb738\tensorflow>python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/label_wav.py \--graph=my_frozen_graph.pb \--labels=conv_labels.txt \--wav=a5d485dc_nohash_0.wav_

I still see the same failure:

_CRITICAL:tensorflow:Audio file does not exist
CRITICAL:tensorflow:Labels file does not exist
CRITICAL:tensorflow:Graph file does not exist__
